snippet: In the case considering the legality of the New York Police Department’s stop-and-frisk tactic, lawyers who brought the suit were sure of the problem, but less sure about how to fix it.
abstract: Ruling in the case considering the legality of the New York Police Department's stop-and-frisk-tactic is expected soon, but there is little consensus on proposed solutions if judge overseeing the trial rules against the department.
lead_paragraph: In the case considering the legality of the New York Police Department’s stop-and-frisk tactic, lawyers who brought the suit were sure of the problem, but less sure about how to fix it.

headline.main: More Complaints Than Proposed Solutions at Trial Over Police Searches
headline.print_headline: More Complaints Than Proposed Solutions at Trial Over Police Searches
